title: [Large-Scale] Empathetic Language Learning Design Project: Text and Expression-Based Solutions Reflecting Emotional Needs

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language instruction design theories, practical experience, and intermediate-level grammar/vocabulary analysis skills
context.additional_context: Solving language learning challenges (low literacy, cultural barriers) faced by actual nonprofit organizations through team-based projects in a smartphone-based limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can propose design solutions reflecting target language learners' emotional needs and reading/expression proficiency levels through team-based collaboration.
Learners can apply empathetic interview techniques in simulation/VR environments to perform learner profiling (language proficiency, learning styles, cultural background).

Learners can develop and evaluate empathetic language learning prototypes (interactive text activities, vocabulary enhancement modules) executable within limited technological environments (smartphones).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
